text: The Heart of O'Yama is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Heart of O YamaPaolo Cherchi Usai. The Griffith Project, Volume 11 and stars Florence Lawrence, George Gebhardt, and D. W. Griffith. The movie is based on the play La Tosca by Victorien Sardou. ==Actors== * Florence Lawrence as O'Yama * George Gebhardt as O'Yama's Lover * D. W. Griffith as Footman * George Nichols as Grand Daimio (unconfirmed) * Mack Sennett as Footman * Harry Solter as Spy ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Heart of O'Yama
